content: U.S. property and casualty insurer Alleghany Corp  is considering a sale of Transatlantic Holdings Inc  also known as TransRe  in a deal that could value the reinsurance unit at around $6.5 billion  people familiar with the matter said.
name: Alleghany Corporation
title: Exclusive: Alleghany mulls sale of TransRe - sources
